name: Grid
description: The Grid is a lightweight, static site that executes in the clients frontend to retrieve an arbitrary list of live contracts for users to browse and interact with. The Grid is highly configurable allowing for any of the ZestBloom supported contracts and sale types to be displayed, but through means of a simple configuration file, what gets displayed may easily be constrained to only a specific collection or curated list of sales.
